ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgvr1.x | |- X = ( var1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | subrgvr1.r | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 3 |  | subrgvr1.h | |- H = ( R |`s T ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mVar R ) = ( 1o mVar R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_1on | |- 1o e. On |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1o e. On ) |
| 7 | 4, 6, 2, 3 | #P_subrgmvr | |- ( ph -> ( 1o mVar R ) = ( 1o mVar H ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( 1o mVar R ) ` (/) ) = ( ( 1o mVar H ) ` (/) ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_vr1val | |- X = ( ( 1o mVar R ) ` (/) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( var1 ` H ) = ( var1 ` H ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_vr1val | |- ( var1 ` H ) = ( ( 1o mVar H ) ` (/) ) |
| 12 | 8, 9, 11 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> X = ( var1 ` H ) ) |
